Detailed Description

Hardware accelerator Configuration Utility API implementation.

void HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuth ( HWA_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  paramSetStartIdx,
uint32_t  numVirtualAnt,
uint32_t  fftOutSize,
uint32_t  numIter,
uint16_t  hwaSourceBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestBufOffset 
)

Configures ParameterSet for azimuth-FFT processing.

Parameters
[in]handleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]numVirtualAntnumber of Virtual antennas (num_tx x num_rx)
[in]fftOutSizeAzimuth FFT length
[in]numIternumber of vectors on which angle-FFT has to be computed
[in]hwaSourceBufOffsetHWA memory offset with input data
[in]hwaDestBufOffsetHWA memory offset with computed angle-FFTs

uint32_t  numVirtualAntElev,

uint32_t  hwaSourceElevBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestElevCplxBufOffset 
)

Configures ParameterSet for azimuth/elevation-FFT processing.

Parameters
[in]handleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]numVirtualAntAzimnumber of Azimuth Virtual antennas (num_azimuth_tx x num_rx)
[in]numVirtualAntElevnumber of Elevation Virtual antennas (num_elevation_tx x num_rx)
[in]fftOutSizeAzimuth FFT length
[in]numIternumber of vectors on which angle-FFT has to be computed
[in]hwaSourceAzimBufOffsetHWA memory offset with azimuth input data
[in]hwaSourceElevBufOffsetHWA memory offset with elevation input data
[in]hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffsetHWA memory offset with computed azimuth-FFTs (log magnitude values)
[in]hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffsetHWA memory offset with computed azimuth-FFTs (complex values)
[in]hwaDestElevCplxBufOffsetHWA memory offset with computed elevation-FFTs (complex values)

void HWAutil_configCFAR ( HWA_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  paramSetStartIdx,
uint32_t  numRangeBins,
uint32_t  numDopplerBins,
uint32_t  winLen,
uint32_t  guardLen,
uint32_t  noiseDivRightShift,
uint8_t  peakGrouping,
uint8_t  cyclicMode,
uint8_t  nAvgMode,
uint16_t  detObjectListSize,
uint8_t  dmaTriggerSource,
uint8_t  dmaDestChannel,
uint16_t  hwaSourceBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestBufOffset 
)

Configures ParameterSet for CFAR detection (The CFAR detection runs along range bins).

Parameters
[in]handleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]numRangeBinsNumber of range bins
[in]numDopplerBinsNUmber of Doppler bins
[in]winLenwindow length in CFAR
[in]guardLenguard length in CFAR
[in]noiseDivRightShiftnoiseDiv factor expressed as right shift in CFAR
[in]peakGroupingpeakGrouping flag in CFAR
[in]cyclicModecyclic mode in CFAR
[in]nAvgModenoise averaging mode in CFAR
[in]detObjectListSizemaximum size of list of detected objects
[in]dmaTriggerSourceDMA trigger source channel
[in]dmaDestChannelDMA destination channel
[in]hwaSourceBufOffsetHWA memory offset with input data: log magnitude 2nd D FFT matrix
[in]hwaDestBufOffsetHWA memory offset with CFAR output results: List of detected objects as array of structures cfarDetOutput_t

void HWAutil_configDopplerFFT ( HWA_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  paramSetStartIdx,
uint32_t  dopplerFftSize,
uint8_t  numVirtualAnt,
uint32_t  numRangeBinsPerIter,
uint32_t  windowOffsetBytes,
uint8_t  dmaTriggerSourcePing,
uint8_t  dmaTriggerSourcePong,
uint8_t  dmaDestChannelPing,
uint8_t  dmaDestChannelPong,
uint16_t  hwaMemSourcePingOffset,
uint16_t  hwaMemSourcePongOffset,
uint16_t  hwaMemDestPingOffset,
uint16_t  hwaMemDestPongOffset,
uint32_t  option 
)

Configures ParameterSet for Range FFT on ADC samples from DFE.

Parameters
[in]handleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]dopplerFftSizeDoppler FFT size
[in]numVirtualAntNumber of Rx virtual antennas
[in]numRangeBinsPerIterNumber of range bins per iteration (currently has to be 2)
[in]windowOffsetBytesWindow offset in bytes (for pre-FFT windowing)
[in]dmaTriggerSourcePingDMA trigger source channel for Ping param set (Ping param set calculates 2nd D FFT for two rows, (even pair of rows))
[in]dmaTriggerSourcePongDMA trigger source channel for Pong param sets (Pong param set calculates 2nd D FFT for two rows, (odd pair of rows))
[in]dmaDestChannelPingDMA destination channel for Ping param sets
[in]dmaDestChannelPongDMA destination channel for Pong param sets
[in]hwaMemSourcePingOffsetHWA memory offset with Ping input data, two rows (range bins) of 1st D FFT symbols
[in]hwaMemSourcePongOffsetHWA memory offset with Pong input data, two rows (range bins) with 1st D FFT symbols
[in]hwaMemDestPingOffsetHWA memory offset with Ping output data, two rows (range bins) with 2nd D FFT complex symbols, followed by two rows (range bins) with summed log magnitude 2nd D FFT symbols across all antennas
[in]hwaMemDestPongOffsetHWA memory offset with Ping output data, two rows (range bins) with 2nd D FFT complex symbols, followed by two rows (range bins) with summed log magnitude 2nd D FFT symbols across all antennas
[in]optionOption to seperate/combine 2DFFT and Log-Mag operation. By combining 2DFFT and Log-Mag operation, high precision can be achieved. 0 - seperate, 1 - combine

void HWAutil_configDopplerFFTSingleRangeBin ( HWA_Handle  handle,
uint32_t  paramSetStartIdx,
uint32_t  dopplerFftSize,
uint8_t  numVirtualAnt,
uint32_t  windowOffsetBytes,
uint8_t  dmaTriggerSource,
uint16_t  hwaMemAzimSource,
uint16_t  hwaMemAzimDest 
)

Configures ParameterSet for single range in 2D FFT on 1D FFT data from radarCube.

Parameters
[in]handleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]dopplerFftSizeDoppler FFT size
[in]numVirtualAntNumber of Rx virtual antennas
[in]windowOffsetBytesWindow offset in bytes (for pre-FFT windowing)
[in]dmaTriggerSourceDMA trigger source channel for Ping param set (Ping param set calculates 2nd D FFT for two rows, (even pair of rows))
[in]hwaMemAzimSourceHWA memory offset with single range bin input data of 1D FFT symbols
[in]hwaMemAzimDestHWA memory offset with single range bin 2D FFT output data

uint16_t  hwaMemAdcBufOffset,

uint16_t  hwaMemDestPongOffset,
uint8_t  hwaTriggerMode 
)

Configures ParameterSet for Range FFT on ADC samples from DFE.

Parameters
[in]handleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]numAdcSamplesNumber of ADC samples
[in]numRangeBinsNumber of range bins (1st D FFT size)
[in]numRxAntNumber of Rx antennas
[in]windowOffsetBytesWindow offset in bytes (for pre-FFT windowing)
[in]dmaTriggerSourcePingDMA trigger source channel for Ping param sets
[in]dmaTriggerSourcePongDMA trigger source channel for Pong param sets
[in]dmaDestChannelPingDMA destination channel for Ping param sets
[in]dmaDestChannelPongDMA destination channel for Pong param sets
[in]hwaMemAdcBufOffsetHWA memory offset ADC buffer
[in]hwaMemDestPingOffsetHWA memory offset for Ping destination
[in]hwaMemDestPongOffsetHWA memory offset for Pong destination
[in]hwaTriggerModeHWA trigger mode
